text: good evening everyone
my name is thiago and i'm part of the
program committee
of this year's edition of the kubernetes
aid in north america
it is a pleasure to present
and to be able to participate in the
planning and the organization of such an
amazing event
and of course
actually see it happen apart even from
miles away
it is quite interesting to see the
discussion focusing on science and
science
methods
and how this approach brings an
inclusive view on technology
in a world that
that we living of so much doubt and
questioning technology a world of fake
news it's quite comforting to see how
science is an ally to technology
and can change this general feeling
so here goes my thank you to all the
speakers for delivering high level
discussion and perspectives on key
subjects
and putting together such impactful
keynotes
could that ever be a time in the history
of our community when the
responsibilities of this conference
would be so significant or the
expectations of it would be greater than
now
the last few months have brought an
enormous disruption to how people
organizations and technology
behave and we will likely see this
continue
demand patterns are changing as
consumers worldwide reduce spending
companies are becoming challenged
to create more capacity to take on
innovation
without introducing high costs or waste
how can machine learning stay resilient
and effective when model assumptions are
based on behaviors that are no longer
prevailing
kubernetes ai they become more than ever
a place where people can discuss new
ways to focus on problem solving in a
consistent
skill and scalable way in the face of
uncertainty
like any transformative technology ai
carries risks and presents challenges
along several dimensions
always remember to stand up for what's
right
the last year has been challenging in
many levels and organizing on hybrid
even was not an easy task but i can
proudly say that this event proves that
our community truly shines in personal
interaction and open exchanges should
and keep
in order to keep us growing bigger and
stronger
and of course it's remarkable that
kubecon and cloud native compute
foundation
have found the technical ways to make it
happen
so i would like to thank everyone who
worked hard to make this conference
possible
and to you participants for being part
engaging asking questions and make it
making it an incredible day
as peter dominguez once said
homo sapiens is the species that adapts
the word of to itself
instead of adapting itself to the world
i hope men and machine can work together
to adapt the world to create a more
inclusive future
i want to finish this gathering by
quoting mahiki
nothing in life is to be feared
it is only to be understood
now is the time to understand more so
that we may fear less
see you all soon thank you very much
